attributes.action: Only sell fireworks with a low noise level to the public
attributes.additional_details: To protect wildlife pets and people with ptsd
attributes.background: Set a noise limit to protect the public and wildlife only allow fireworks to be sold to the public for silent or low noise fireworks and allow displays and events to use loud noise level fireworks

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758
